title: Cardfight!! Vanguard Will+Dress D2
description: Mukae Jinki have gathered 15 Fighters, and One who have chosen from winning all the Shop Tournaments. These 16 fighters will fight for the throne to be the strongest, as the Curtain for the Second Deluxe Opens!! Who will be the one to Control the fight, who will be the one to win!?

altTitles.ja: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード will+Dress D2
